definition: (theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances
to patrol/to make one's rounds/classifier for rounds of drinks
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: The album was compiled from live recordings from last year's tour.
sentences.chinese: 这套唱片选辑由去年巡回演出的实况录音汇编而成。

sentences.english: The Negro minstrel is touring the country.
sentences.chinese: 那个黑人歌舞团正在全国各地巡回演出。

sentences.english: Amanda:Tell your parents that the performer is a renowned soprano who seldom tours.
sentences.chinese: 告诉你父母演出者是一位很少巡回演出的著名女高音。

sentences.english: The play will tour several cities in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 这部戏将于今年春季在几个城市巡回演出。

sentences.english: They are traveling with the show on its tour.
sentences.chinese: 他们随巡回演出队同行。

sentences.english: They say this show is going on the road next month.
sentences.chinese: 他们说这台戏下个月要出去巡回演出。

sentences.english: At present， they are visiting all parts of the country. They will be arriving here tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 目前他们正在全国各地巡回演出，明天就要到达此地。

sentences.english: I continued touring for years, always as the lead singer.
sentences.chinese: 那几年里，我仍然在巡回演出，通常都是主唱。

sentences.english: In connection with the record release, Secret Garden will do a concert tour in Norway.
sentences.chinese: 与专辑发行同步，神秘园将在挪威巡回演出。

sentences.english: The play will tour the provinces in the autumn.
sentences.chinese: 这部戏将于今年秋季在这几个省巡回演出。

sentences.english: Demin dropped in on me when their troupe is on tour here yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 德闽昨天来这里巡回演出，顺便来学校看我。

sentences.english: Acrobatic troupes have toured more than 100 countries and regions throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 杂技团到世界100多个国家和地区巡回演出。

sentences.english: The kids followed the mobile cultural troupe for quite a distance.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们尾随着巡回演出队走了好远。

sentences.english: The theatrical troupe is touring the country.
sentences.chinese: 剧团正在全国各地巡回演出。

sentences.english: The band is on tour in France.
sentences.chinese: 这支乐队在法国巡回演出。

sentences.english: Since then, he has been touring, and writing music.
sentences.chinese: 打那以后，他就一直在边巡回演出，边写歌。

definition: (theater etc) to tour/to be on tour/to give itinerant performances/abbr. for 巡迴演出|巡回演出[xun2 hui2 yan3 chu1]
to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
to perform (e.g. on the stage)/to lecture
maiden stage role/first performance/first public showing
